citeinfo.origin: U.S. Navy, Office of Naval Research and Charles N. Flagg, Brookhaven National Laboratory, New York.
citeinfo.title: Shipboard ADCP Data Base of the Sea of Japan

abstract.p: Shipboard Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler (ADCP) data from the R/V Revelle.

You can retrieve data directly from the japan_east database by filling out the web form provided. The data retrieved are either .mat file or plain ASCII file, depending on your needs. The output data include yearday, lon, lat, depth(m), u(m/s), v(m/s), backscatter intensity and estimated zooplankton biomass.
Part of the U.S. Office of Naval Research (ONR) supported research in the Japan/East Sea (JES) during 1998-2000. JES website URL: http://sam.ucsd.edu/onr_jes/onr_jes.html

descript.purpose: To make ADCP data available to JES investigators.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
